PathOfBuilding.Notes:
PLEASE CHECK THE VIDEO GUIDE FOR MORE INFO <https://youtu.be/YLEoOe18-dU>
THIS BUILD MANAGED TO COMPLETE ALL CONTENT IN THE GAME WITH LITTLE TO NO ISSUES. IT IS MAINLY A BOSS KILLING BUILD BUT WITH A SMALL AMOUNT OF INVESTMENT CLEARS MAPS EXTREMELY QUICKLY.
THERE ARE MULTIPLE LEVELING TREES AS WELL AS MULTIPLE GEAR SETS PLEASE LOOK THROUGH THEM THOUROUGHLY.
THE RARE ITEMS IN THE BUILD ARE ONLY SUGGESTIONS. GATHER WHAT STATS YOU NEED. DO NOT IGNORE CHAOS RESISTANCE. YOU DO NOT NEED ALL OF THE STATS ON THE ITEMS. BUILD UP WHAT RESISTS AND FOCUS ON DEFENSES BEFORE OFFENCES
======================LEVELING SECTION======================
KILL ALL BANDITS FOR 2 PASSIVE POINTS.
WHILE LEVELING YOU CAN BEGIN WITH ETHEREAL KNIVES AND TRANSITION INTO BLADE VORTEX EITHER IMMEDIATELY OR UPON OBTAINING UNLEASH. YOU CAN ALSO RUN BOTH, USING EK TO CLEAR AND BV TO KILL BOSSES.
THE SUGGESTED SKILLS ARE IN ORDER OF IMPORTANCE IN THE LEVELING SKILLS. USE HOWEVER MANY YOU CAN WITH THE LINKS YOU HAVE AVAILABLE.
DON'T FORGET TO SUPPLEMENT YOUR STATS ON THE TREE WITH THE +30 STAT NODES.
THE BUILD BEGINS AS A PHYSICAL BUILD THAT SCALES *GAINED AS ELEMENTAL DAMAGE* YOU TRANSITION EASILY INTO POISON LATER ON.
THE BUILD MAY FEEL SLOWER TOWARDS LEVELS 30-40 UNTIL YOU OBTAIN UNLEASH. THIS IS WHEN THE BUILD WILL REACH ITS FASTEST LEVELING.
YOU CAN CHOOSE OTHER ASCENDANCY POINTS IF YOU LIKE BUT YOU WILL NEED TO SWAP INTO THE ONES LISTED AT LATE GAME FOR FULL EFFECTIVENESS. AMBUSH AND ASSASSINATE IS A GOOD CHOICE FOR LEVELING.
UPON REACHING MAPS TAKE NOTE OF YOUR RESISTANCES AND YOUR LINKS. INVEST YOUR EARLY CURRENCY INTO FIXING YOUR RESIST PROBLEMS AND ATTEMPT TO AQUIRE A TABULA RASA CHESTPIECE OR A CORRUPTED 6 LINK CHESTPIECE WITH SOLID STATS AND THE CORRECT COLORS.
FOR AURAS YOU WILL NOT BE ABLE TO RUN ALL OF THEM INITIALLY, I SUGGEST THAT YOU START WITH MALEVOLENCE AND HERALD OF AGONY AND THEN AS YOU OBTAIN MORE GEAR ADD IN SKITTERBOTS AND FINALLY ASPECT OF THE SPIDER WHEN THE BUILD IS COMPLETE.
WITH ALL AURAS ON YOU WILL BE AT 0 MANA AND WILL RELY ON THE HELMET PROVIDING ENERGY SHIELD AS YOUR MANA SOURCE.
======================PLAYING THE BUILD======================
THE INITIAL FOCUS OF THE BUILD IS TO SCALE AS MUCH "GAINED AS ELEMENTAL" EARLY ON WHILE LEVELING AND ACHIEVE MAXIMUM BLADE VORTEX STACKS AT ALL TIMES. LATER YOU WILL SWAP TO USING BLADE VORTEX TO QUICKLY STACK MANY POISONS ON ENEMIES.
THIS IS ACCOMPLISHED THROUGH AURAS AND THE UNLEASH GEM.
KEEP STACKS OF BLADE VORTEX AT 10 AND MOVE THROUGH ENEMIES WHILE USING PLAGUE BEARER TO ASSIST WITH CLEAR.
MAKE SURE TO KEEP UP FORTIFY FOR DIFFICULT BOSSES AND ENEMIES THROUGH WHIRLING BLADES.
MAKE SURE TO USE WITHERING STEP TO APPLY WITHER STACKS TO BOSSES.
IF YOU ARE USING A DEVOURING DIADEM WITH THE "FOCUS" ENCHANT MAKE SURE TO ACTIVATE THIS WHILE YOU HAVE VAAL BLADE VORTEX AND 10 STACKS OF NORMAL VORTEX GOING FOR ADDITIONAL DPS.
FOR ADDITIONAL CLEAR POTENTIAL LOOK FOR MY VIDEO HERE https://youtu.be/3dQc7ReHdyE ON HOW TO CRAFT THE EXPLODY CHEST.
======================CONFIGURATION======================
WE OBTAIN THE NUMBER OF POISONS APPLIED RECENTLY BY TAKING (RECENTLY = 4 SECONDS) x 7.50 HIT RATE x 100% POISON CHANCE.
======================FINAL THOUGHTS======================
THIS BUILD WITH ENOUGH INVESTMENT SHOULD BE ABLE TO COMPLETE 95% OF THE GAME BUT WILL SUFFER FROM LACK OF EHP WITHOUT INVESTMENT OF JEWELS AND ITEMS WITH HIGH LIFE.
YOU WILL DIE OCCASIONALLY WITH THIS BUILD. IT IS BOUND TO HAPPEN WITH DODGE BASED BUILDS.
IF YOU HAVE ANY SUGGESTIONS ON IMPROVING THIS BUILD FEEL FREE TO CONTACT ME THROUGH DISCORD https://discord.gg/aDtqeDC WITH THAT INFO.
Thanks for reading all the way down to here! Enjoy the build and let your friends know about my YouTube Channel / Twitch Stream and Discord server!
Thanks, have fun, and stay safe out there in Wraeclast! Hope to see you next time!!
